Title: Enacts the Treyvan Rowe child and young teen mental health community safety act
Summary: Enacts the "Trevyan Rowe child and young teen mental health community safety act"; directs boards of education to create policies, procedures, and guidelines for at-risk children and young teens who have demonstrated suicidal ideation, been victims of harassment or bullying, and/or who have eloped from school property; establishes a commission to evaluate the safety and security of children in primary and secondary public and private schools in this state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "Trevyan Rowe child and young teen mental health community safety act"
